title: A declaration of the three deputy-governors of the Isle of Wight, to his Excellency the Lord Fairfax, concerning the taking of His Majesties person into safe custody: with a letter from the House of Commons to Col. Generall Lambert, now commander in chief at the leaguer before Pontefract. As also, His Excellencies declaration, to avoid interruption in the excise office. Published by authority.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
notes: The declaration of the three deputy-governors is signed: Maj. Rolph, Cap. Boreman, & Cap. Hawes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
